label: Simple Migration
description: This is a simple migration that runs a single batch.

label: Multi-Batch Migration
description: A migration that processes 15 items in batches of 5.

label: Not Applicable Migration
description: A migration that should never run because it is not applicable.

label: Failing Migration
description: A migration that intentionally fails for testing error handling.

label: Tagged Migration
description: A migration with tags for testing tag-based filtering.

label: Counter Migration
description: Increments a counter option by 1 each batch until reaching 10. Rollback decrements back to 0.

label: Large Data Migration
description: Processes 100 items in batches of 10. Useful for testing progress bars and batch processing UI.

label: Settings Format Migration
description: Converts plugin settings from the legacy format to the new structured format. This is a quick, single-batch operation.
